#summary Getting started with HW-SPAR3AN-SK-UNI-G Starter Kit

<img src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/PlatformsDescription/HW-SPAR3AN-SK-UNI-G.png" width="320" height="240" align="right">

This page is about running Embox on [http://www.xilinx.com/products/boards-and-kits/HW-SPAR3AN-SK-UNI-G.htm Spartan-3AN Starter Kit] - FPGA platform evaluation board.

= Step-by-step =

 # Install [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/linux-hotplug/fxload-2008_10_13.tar.gz fxload]
 # Install *Xilinx_11.1_ISE_DS_SFD.tar*
{{{
sudo ./xsetup
}}}
 # Choose to install *Embedded Development Kit*
 # Choose *Install Cable Drivers* (if you don't use RH or Suse, then [http://www.xilinx.com/support/answers/22648.htm readme], driver doesn't support kernel > 2.6.18)
 # Update with *Xilinx_11.3_ISE_DS_lin.tar*
 # After connecting the USB cable try:
{{{
/sbin/fxload -v -t fx2 -I path/Xilinx/11.1/common/bin/lin/xusb_emb.hex -D /dev/bus/usb/dev_num/id
export LD_PRELOAD=libusb-driver.so
export PATH=path/Xilinx/11.1/EDK/bin/lin:$PATH
xmd -hw system.xml
}}}
 # Attach with...
{{{
mb-gdb -nw path/to/embox
}}}
 ... and execute these commands:
{{{
> target remote localhost:1234
> load
> define ss
> si
> x/2i $pc
> end
}}}

See also these [http://embox.googlecode.com/files/xilinx-spartan-dev-kit.xz scripts].
